name: Pushcut
natural_language_description: 这是 Pushcut 节点。主要用于: Consume Pushcut API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: notification

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: send

notificationName.name: notificationName
notificationName.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
notificationName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Notification Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: devices (值: None) - List of devices this notification is sent to. (default is all devices). Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
input (值: None) - Value that is passed as input to the notification action
text (值: None) - Text that is used instead of the one defined in the app
title (值: None) - Title that is used instead of the one defined in the app
